mapper.select: SELECT count( CASE os.order_status WHEN 10 THEN os.order_status END ) AS waitPayCounts, count( CASE os.order_status WHEN 20 THEN os.order_status END ) AS waitDeliverCounts, count( CASE os.order_status WHEN 30 THEN os.order_status END ) AS waitReceiveCounts, count( CASE os.order_status WHEN 40 THEN os.order_status END ) AS waitCommentCounts FROM orders o LEFT JOIN `order_status` os ON o.id = os.order_id WHERE user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY user_id

SELECT o.id AS orderId, os.order_status as orderStatus, os.pay_time AS payTime, os.deliver_time AS deliverTime, os.success_time AS successTime FROM orders o LEFT JOIN `order_status` os ON o.id = os.order_id WHERE o.user_id = #{userId} AND os.order_status BETWEEN 20 AND 40 ORDER BY pay_time, deliver_time, success_time ASC LIMIT #{page}, #{pageSize}
SELECT count(*) FROM orders o LEFT JOIN `order_status` os ON o.id = os.order_id WHERE o.user_id = #{userId} AND os.order_status BETWEEN 20 AND 40
